name: RubiksCube_Unity
description:
A small Rubiks Cube simulation I have done to introduce myself to Unity.

Move the sides of the cube by dragging them or enter the wanted movement in the "Next" command line. 

Shuffle the cube by pressing shuffle followed by Move.

Solve does not work on itch.io because the algorithm needs precalculated tables, which are not involved in the webgl version.

F and R to do the next move in the Next line, or the last one in the Done line.

https://gitlab.com/codevonchris/unity_rubickscube
